Upgrading
=========

A migration system is provided to upgrade from a previous release. You
can use the following steps to migrate the db to the proper state::

  $ ./bin/django syncdb

  $ ./bin/django migrate wheeljack

0.3 to 0.4
==========

The upgrade system was first introduced in 0.4. To upgrade to this version you will need to run this command before the final migration step::

  $ ./bin/django migrate wheeljack --fake
